entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LibraryImport causes CS8795 #74562
  • Roslyn Scripting APIs for Blazor WebAssembly #74555

Closed

  • How to prevent visual studio from inserting <see langword=""/> in comments #74417
  • Collection expressions apply to types implementing IEnumerable<T> and containing an Add(X) method but no implicit conversion between X and T #74543
  • new() with Nullable<DateTime> type #74556
  • Keep ref struct interfaces behind preview flag #73923
    17.12
  • Saving an AdditionalFiles document in Balanced mode fails to trigger source generator #74395
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35124.136 #74546
  • Debug assert triggered for interpolated string convserion #74427
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Rename Suggestions: Fix getting of the context string, gracefully handle errors #74564
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove a closure allocation from WrappedNavigationBarItem.ctor #74563
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Eliminate contentChanged parameter #74561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick #74507 #74560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • DocumentState constructors refactoring #74559
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid optimizing away ref array access #74553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose inlay hints to Razor cohosting #74548
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move code to code style layer #74547
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't bring up completion when deleting in an xml doc comment's text #74558
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Instance extensions: prevent user's code from changing value of receiver when it has reference type and is passed by reference. #74508
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion to 8.0.4 #74489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Move 'generate default constructor' code fix to shared layer. #74557
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't try and add the result diagnostics if they are default or empty #74507
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74540
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Feedback from 'source gen save' pr #74554
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true #74549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move IDS_FeatureRefStructInterfaces to C# 13 #74551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Rerun generators when an additional file is saved. #74542
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move more code down to shared layer #74539
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Include InterpolatedString conversions in standard implicit conversion from expression assert #74529
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions (alt) #74495
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid assert in emit layer when intercepted call implicitly captures receiver to temp #74509
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make it possible to build/run tests on linux-arm64 #74536
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Report fading locations as part of the main diagnostic #74541
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • EnC: Implement support for System.Threading.Lock #74526
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lock Type
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
